20101201230624.000|20101201230626.000|CCO|HAVE BEEN FORMALLY FILED?
20101201230626.000|20101201230628.000|CCO|>> WHAT OCCURS IN A CASE LIKE 
20101201230628.000|20101201230630.000|CCO|THIS IS THAT SWEDEN IS PURSUING 
20101201230630.000|20101201230632.000|CCO|THE INVESTIGATION, AND THEY 
20101201230632.000|20101201230634.500|CCO|INDICT HIM ON THE CHARGES AND 
20101201230634.500|20101201230637.000|CCO|THEN THEY HAVE THEIR OWN 
20101201230637.000|20101201230639.500|CCO|PROVISIONAL ARREST WARRANT, AND 
20101201230639.500|20101201230642.000|CCO|THEY GO TO LEON, FRANCE, AND THE
20101201230642.000|20101201230644.500|CCO|INTERPOL UNIT WILL REVIEW THE 
20101201230644.500|20101201230647.000|CCO|PACKAGE TO SEE IF THE CHARGES 
20101201230647.000|20101201230649.500|CCO|ARE POLITICALLY MOTIVATED AS 
20101201230649.500|20101201230652.000|CCO|ASSANGE HAS SAID IN INTERVIEWS 
20101201230652.000|20101201230653.667|CCO|OR A WITCH HUNT AGAINST HIM OR 
20101201230653.667|20101201230655.333|CCO|VALID CAUSE IN THE ORIGINAL 
20101201230655.333|20101201230657.000|CCO|INVESTIGATION TO SUPPORT THE 
20101201230657.000|20101201230658.667|CCO|ORIGINAL WARRANTS BY SWEDEN.
20101201230658.667|20101201230700.333|CCO|IF THEY DETERMINE THERE IS, 
20101201230700.333|20101201230702.000|CCO|WHICH THEY HAVE, THEY ISSUE THE 
20101201230702.000|20101201230704.000|CCO|RED NOTICES.
20101201230704.000|20101201230706.000|CCO|THE RED NOTICE IS AN 
20101201230706.000|20101201230708.000|CCO|INTERNATIONAL WANTED POSTER THAT
20101201230708.000|20101201230710.000|CCO|TELLS THE WORLD THAT THIS 
20101201230710.000|20101201230712.000|CCO|INDIVIDUAL HAS BEEN CHARGED, AND

20101201230713.429|20101201230714.857|CCO|EXTRADITED BACK TO SWEDEN IF YOU
20101201230714.857|20101201230716.286|CCO|APPREHEND HIM. 
20101201230716.286|20101201230717.714|CCO|>> AND THE SWEDISH COURT SYSTEMS
20101201230717.714|20101201230719.143|CCO|WOULD TAKE UP THE MATTER. 
20101201230719.143|20101201230720.571|CCO|>> YES, SO INTERPOL'S PROCESS IN
20101201230720.571|20101201230722.000|CCO|THIS IS TO BASICALLY SAY THAT 
20101201230722.000|20101201230724.000|CCO|THE ORIGINAL WARRANTS ARE NOT

20101201230730.000|20101201230732.000|CCO|>> THE WHITE HOUSE ANNOUNCED A

20101201230757.000|20101201230758.667|CCO|KNOWN IN THE INTELLIGENCE 
20101201230758.667|20101201230800.333|CCO|COMMUNITY AND THE 
20101201230800.333|20101201230802.000|CCO|COUNTERTERRORISM COMMUNITY AS 
20101201230802.000|20101201230803.250|CCO|WELL, BUT BE HONEST, ONE MORE 
20101201230803.250|20101201230804.500|CCO|CZAR IS NOT GOING TO SOLVE THE
